alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 6:49AM EST until December 19 at 11:52PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at North Creek. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water reaches minor flood stage and inundates low areas including portions of Old River Road upstream of the Route 28N bridge. At 11.0 feet, Water reaches moderate flood stage. State Route 28 in North River has about half a foot of water across it. Carpenter`s Field is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:32 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 6.3 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River North Creek Flood Stage: 10.0 Observed Stage at Tue 6 am: 10.8 Forecast: Tue 7 am 10.8 Tue 1 pm 10.4 Tue 7 pm 9.9 Wed 1 am 9.3 Wed 7 am 8.9 Wed 1 pm 8.6 Wed 7 pm 8.2 Thu 1 am 7.8 Thu 7 am 7.4 Thu 1 pm 7.0 Thu 7 pm 6.7 Fri 1 am 6.3 &&
